original_text: And he made an house of high places, and made priests of the lowest of the people, which were not of the sons of Levi.
korean_text: 그가 또 산당들을 짓고 레위 자손 아닌 보통 백성으로 제사장을 삼고

sentences.original_text: And he made an house of high places
and made priests of the lowest of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성 중 가장 미천한 자들로 제사장을 삼았으니

sentences.original_text: which were not of sons of Levi
